name: One Minute Away
description:
Welcome on my 5th Ludum Dare Compo entry!

Man, this theme was HARD. Not just hard but really HARD.  

I brainstormed during hours finding a pitch fitting for this theme, so there you go (narrator voice activated):

"Time is collapsing. You, the hero of this story, have to once again save the world by fighting the Time itself, avoiding traps and getting deeper and deeper."

Here's what the Time will do to block you:

  • every 10 seconds, you will be weaker, slower
  • every 10 seconds, you will receive a special effect in your face
  • but fortunately for you, if you break the time locks, you will take precious seconds from the Time itself.

If you are too slow to finish the level, consider yourself frozen until the end of the ages.

Make sure to finish all the levels, and let me know if you enjoyed the game.
...ah and put your headphones on, make sure you play with sound!

Good luck, and have fun!

GitHub: https://github.com/Srynetix/one-minute-away/
